data.name: Vegas Infinite
data.description:
This is not a gambling product and does not provide an opportunity to win real money. 18+ only. Please play responsibly.

Ryu and Chun-Li player packs are now available! Check out the Meta bundle for a discount.

PokerStars presents Vegas Infinite, a world of entertainment with no limits. Challenge friends and players all over the globe and play electrifying poker, blackjack, roulette, craps, and slots.

Leap into breath-taking environments with intuitive chip, dice and card movements. Study players’ tells and chat in real time just like in live games.

Light up the tables with an endless supply of interactive props and dress to impress with a giant collection of customizable accessories and apparel.

Your big night out just got bigger. We’ve saved you a seat.

Vegas Infinite also features Quest Pro support, with face and eye tracking, advanced haptics, and mixed reality passthrough.

Please note that we will no longer offer support for Quest 1, effective October 18, 2023.

Access to IAP may be restricted by location.

Vegas Infinite VOIP is monitored by ToxMod.

Vegas Infinite is not a gambling product and does not present an opportunity to win real money. 18+ only. Please play responsibly.
